name: U.A. Outfield
text: When this card is activated, you can reveal 1 "U.A." monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "U.A." monster from your hand or GY with a different name. If a ".U.A." monster is return to your hand by the effect of a "U.A." card: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; reutrn it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "U.A. Outfield" once per turn.
